# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $9500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the return on our investment. We're confident it aligns well with your valuation of $10000, providing you with a favorable opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer
